item.title: Vários - Stay With Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
Stay With Me - Sam Smith
Using the chords: Am C F
This is one of the first songs we learn and the ukuleles in the video match the colour of the chords we use (Rainbow method).
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Vários - Best Day Of My Life
item.description: This is a "reboot" of an old video. Chords: C, F, Am Strum: D DU -U DU

item.title: Vários - All Of Me
item.description: Em, C, G, D, Am - Strum guide audio at the beginning of the video. The pattern is a suggestion, but I encourage you to listen to the rhythm that is in the audio and vary the rhythm to match what's in the audio!
